page.title: 16Recreation
page.content: There are two swimming pools in Ilford. One is an indoor pool. The outdoor pool is in Valentines Park. Also in Valentines Park is a boating lake, bowling greens, tennis courts, football and cricket pitches and a miniature golf course. A survey shows that 52 local people visited the park in one hour. Of 26 interviewed, 10 went everyday and the others once a week. People went for walks, to entertain chilren and for sports, but wanted improved toilets and more benches. There are two snooker clubs. The Kenneth More Theatre has 365 seats and a 50 seat restaurant, a licensed bar, coffee bar and 50 seat studio theatre. The under 35's enjoy discos, eating out and sport while over 35'S prefer walking, gardening and knitting.
